testCase.name: LanguageToggle calls changeLanguage when buttons are clicked
NotificationPanel renders close all button when notifications exist
NotificationPanel does not render close all button when no notifications
NotificationPanel calls onDismiss when X button is clicked
NotificationPanel calls onDismissAll when Close All button is clicked
NotificationPanel renders alert circle icons for each notification
DisasterLocationMap renders map container when coordinates are provided
DisasterLocationMap renders fallback message when coordinates are missing
